title: Client bugs?
body: I don't know if anyone else is having this issue, but a lot of the time when I click the shortcut to get into the client the League of legends graphic pops up but the client fails to run. I would just like to know if this is a fixable solution or if there's a bug. Please and thank you.

replies.body: We typically see this happen if League isn't operating with the right system permissions. I recommend right-clicking on the shortcut and select *run as administrator*. Let me know if this resolved your issue!
